attributes.action: Force GP surgeries to offer advanced bookings for appointments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment my gp surgery does not offer appointments that can be booked in advance. If I wish to see my GP I have to ring each monrning at a set time and hope that an appointment is available. If there are none I have to ring again the following morning. I've been ringing daily for a week now and still have no appointment. I could go on like this forever!!
